attributes.review:
Okay to keep it simple I'm going to describe what happened after I downloaded this app in a list:

• The Twilight Zone theme song immediately began to play, but on top of the theme song from Bonanza 🎶🎶🎵 It was BIZARRE people, but I didn't know what was about to happen next... 

• The room grew freezing cold, so much I could see my own breath 💨❄️

• In spite of the intense cold, all of my science books spontaneously combusted 🔥🔥🔥 It was like the combination of hot and cold of a pizookie at BJ's only y'know, TERRIFYING and not at all delicious 😱

• At this point, I think 🤔 💭 Well I've gotta delete this app immediately, but when I reached for my phone, it ZAPPED me! ⚡️📵

• I went to grab rubber gloves to get the job done, but when I came back, the phone was gone! 🤯

• I saw something in the corner of my eye, but when I looked, nothing 👀 

• I could hear something moving about, left, right, north, south, but couldn't see, it was moving so fast! 

• Finally, it revealed itself to confront me! My PHONE had sprouted robot legs and it was squared up to challenge me in a fight to the death 💀 

• I started to recite scientific and historical facts and suddenly it was shaking and shedding hair, which fell into a pile in the shape of a comb-over!

• My phone no longer had legs, so I quickly grabbed it and locked myself in a closet, just so I could write this review with m'last few moments...

• Guys. I hear the hair moving on the other side of this door. (It sounds angrier than a mildly inconvenienced lady demanding a manager, so like, reeeeally mad). If you don't hear from me in 20 minutes, please, please, send help. 

(P.S. If you do decide to play a bit of Russian roulette and download this app, impart your harrowing tale(s) of survival. Pay it forward.)
